tasks.title: Set up Chrome Extension project structure
tasks.description: Create the basic Chrome Extension project structure with all necessary files and directories
tasks.details: Create the foundational files for the Chrome Extension including manifest.json, popup files, content script, and styling. Set up the project directory structure according to Chrome Extension best practices.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all files are created and the extension loads without errors in Chrome

subtasks.title: Create project directory structure
subtasks.description: Set up the basic folder structure for the Chrome extension
subtasks.details: Create necessary directories including assets, scripts, styles, and organize the project according to Chrome extension best practices

subtasks.title: Create popup.html skeleton
subtasks.description: Create the basic HTML file for the extension popup
subtasks.details: Create popup.html with basic structure, form elements for keyword input, and result display areas

subtasks.title: Create popup.css skeleton
subtasks.description: Create the basic CSS file for styling the popup
subtasks.details: Create popup.css with basic styling, layout structure, and responsive design elements

subtasks.title: Create JavaScript files skeleton
subtasks.description: Create the basic JavaScript files structure
subtasks.details: Create popup.js and content.js skeleton files with basic structure and placeholder functions

tasks.title: Create Manifest V3 configuration
tasks.description: Implement the manifest.json file with proper Manifest V3 specifications
tasks.details: Configure manifest.json with proper permissions, content scripts, popup configurations, and all necessary Chrome Extension APIs for the keyword ranking functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Load extension in Chrome and verify it appears in extensions list without errors

subtasks.title: Create basic manifest structure
subtasks.details: Set up manifest.json with basic Manifest V3 structure, name, version, and description

subtasks.title: Configure popup action settings
subtasks.details: Add action configuration for popup.html, set popup dimensions and default popup behavior

subtasks.title: Configure content scripts
subtasks.details: Configure content_scripts section to inject content.js into Google search pages with proper match patterns

subtasks.title: Configure permissions
subtasks.details: Add necessary permissions for activeTab, storage, and host permissions for Google search pages

tasks.title: Design and implement popup UI
tasks.description: Create the user interface for keyword input and rank display
tasks.details: Design and implement popup.html and popup.css for the extension's user interface. Include keyword input field, 'Check Rank' button, results display area, and loading states.
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI responsiveness, input validation, and visual design across different screen sizes

tasks.title: Implement popup JavaScript functionality
tasks.description: Add interactive functionality to the popup interface
tasks.details: Implement popup.js to handle user interactions, form validation, communication with content scripts, and result display. Include error handling for empty inputs and API failures.
tasks.testStrategy: Test keyword input validation, button interactions, and message passing between popup and content scripts

tasks.title: Develop Google Search automation
tasks.description: Create functionality to programmatically perform Google searches
tasks.details: Implement the logic to automatically navigate to Google search with the specified keyword. Handle search query formatting, URL construction, and page navigation while avoiding bot detection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test various keyword types and verify search results are loaded correctly

tasks.title: Implement SERP DOM scraping logic
tasks.description: Create content script to parse Google search results
tasks.details: Develop content.js to scrape and analyze Google Search Results Page (SERP). Extract organic search results, identify result elements, and prepare data for ranking analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Test DOM scraping on various Google search result pages and verify correct data extraction

subtasks.title: Research Google SERP selectors
subtasks.details: Research and identify the correct CSS selectors for Google search result elements including titles, snippets, and URLs

subtasks.title: Implement DOM extraction logic
subtasks.details: Implement functions to extract search result data including title, snippet, URL, and position from DOM elements

subtasks.title: Handle layout variations
subtasks.details: Implement logic to handle various Google result layouts, featured snippets, and different result types

subtasks.title: Design result data structure
subtasks.description: Create data structure for search results
subtasks.details: Design and implement a consistent data structure to store extracted search result information for processing

tasks.title: Build keyword matching algorithm
tasks.description: Implement logic to find keyword occurrences in search results
tasks.details: Create algorithm to match the input keyword against search result titles, snippets, and visible text. Implement fuzzy matching and ranking logic to determine keyword position.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various keywords and verify accurate rank detection for different match scenarios

subtasks.title: Create exact string matching
subtasks.details: Create exact string matching function to find keyword occurrences in titles and snippets

subtasks.title: Implement fuzzy matching
subtasks.details: Implement fuzzy matching to handle partial matches, different word orders, and similar phrases

subtasks.title: Add text normalization
subtasks.details: Implement text normalization for case-insensitive matching and handle special characters

subtasks.title: Calculate relevance scores
subtasks.details: Implement algorithm to calculate relevance scores for matches and determine the best matching result

tasks.title: Implement rank position detection
tasks.description: Create functionality to determine and return keyword ranking position
tasks.details: Develop logic to calculate the exact position where a keyword appears in search results (1-100). Handle cases where keyword is not found and return appropriate messages.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify correct rank positions are returned for various keyword scenarios including edge cases

tasks.title: Add bot detection avoidance mechanisms
tasks.description: Implement strategies to avoid Google's bot detection systems
tasks.details: Add delays, randomization, and other techniques to make the extension's behavior appear more human-like and avoid triggering Google's anti-bot measures.
tasks.testStrategy: Test extension functionality over multiple searches and verify no bot detection triggers

tasks.title: Implement error handling and edge cases
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling for various failure scenarios
tasks.details: Implement robust error handling for network failures, Google layout changes, invalid inputs, and other edge cases. Provide meaningful error messages to users.
tasks.testStrategy: Test various error scenarios and verify appropriate error messages and recovery mechanisms

tasks.title: Add local storage for search history
tasks.description: Implement optional keyword search history functionality
tasks.details: Create local storage system to save previous keyword searches and their rankings. Implement data persistence and retrieval for user convenience.
tasks.testStrategy: Test history storage, retrieval, and data persistence across browser sessions

tasks.title: Create comprehensive testing suite
tasks.description: Develop thorough testing for all extension functionality
tasks.details: Create test cases for various keyword types (brand, local business, long-tail), validate rank accuracy, test UI responsiveness, and edge case handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute full test suite covering all acceptance criteria and edge cases

subtasks.title: Unit tests for matching logic
subtasks.description: Create unit tests for keyword matching
subtasks.details: Write unit tests for the keyword matching algorithm including exact matches, fuzzy matches, and edge cases

subtasks.title: UI interaction testing
subtasks.details: Test popup interface interactions, form validation, and user experience flows

subtasks.title: Keyword variety testing
subtasks.details: Create test cases for brand keywords, local business terms, long-tail keywords, and special characters

subtasks.title: End-to-end integration testing
subtasks.details: Test end-to-end functionality from keyword input to rank result display including content script communication

tasks.title: Write documentation and README
tasks.description: Create user documentation and installation instructions
tasks.details: Write comprehensive README.md with installation instructions, usage guide, troubleshooting, and developer documentation. Include screenshots and step-by-step guides.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation accuracy by following installation and usage instructions

tasks.title: Package extension for distribution
tasks.details: Package the extension into a .zip file ready for Chrome Web Store or manual installation. Ensure all files are included and properly configured.
tasks.testStrategy: Test extension installation from packaged .zip file on different Chrome installations

tasks.title: Final testing and optimization
tasks.description: Conduct final round of testing and performance optimization
tasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing of the complete extension, optimize performance, fix any remaining bugs, and ensure all acceptance criteria are met.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute complete acceptance criteria checklist and performance benchmarks

metadata.project: Chrome Extension â€“ Keyword Rank Finder for Google Search
